author: King0fBrains
install_msg:
Thanks for installing Speak!
Get started with `[p]help Speak`.
name: Speak
short: Allows you to talk as the bot!
description: My personal cog for talking as the bot! It draws inspiration from wanting to have commands from multiple cogs in one place. The cogs that this draws inspiration from are Laggron42's *Say* cog, Obi-Wan3's *Reply* cog, and NeuroAssassin's *editor* cog.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
